name: POLY WARS
description:
POLY  WARS

GET A BATTLE WITH POLYGONS.

Get into the Arena of POLYGONS and  FIGHT against Red Menacing SQUARES

      + USE YOUR MOUSE TO AIM.

      + USE WASD KEYS FOR MOVEMENT.

      + CLICK THE BUTTON AT BOTTOM RIGHT CORNER TO CHANGE TO NIGHT VIEW.
